languages.text: "Что ж, Лорд-капитан..." {n}Абеляр чуть медлит, на его лице — печать прожитых лет, в эту минуту проступившая особенно явно.{/n} "Позвольте выразить свое сожаление, что семья Версериан {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}не оправдала{/d} возложенных на нее обязательств и оказанного доверия. Надеюсь, дворянский род, который в будущем займет ее место, проявит себя лучше, чем моя кровь".

"Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, Лорд-капитан..." {n}Абеляр чуть медлит, на его лице — печать прожитых лет, в эту минуту проступившая особенно явно.{/n} "Позвольте выразить свое сожаление, что семья Версериан {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}не оправдала{/d} возложенных на нее обязательств и оказанного доверия. Надеюсь, дворянский род, который в будущем займет ее место, проявит себя лучше, чем моя кровь".

I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

traits.locale_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Bien, Lord Capitán...». {n}Abelard vacila un instante, y su rostro acusa los estragos de su avanzada edad.{/n} «Permítame expresar mi aflicción por el hecho de que la familia Werserian {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}no haya estado a la altura{/d} de la confianza y las obligaciones que le fueron depositadas. Confío en que el noble linaje que ocupe su lugar en el futuro demuestre ser más digno que mi propia sangre».
languages.original_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

traits.locale_text: «Bien, Lord Capitán...». {n}Abelard vacila un instante, y su rostro acusa los estragos de su avanzada edad.{/n} «Permítame expresar mi aflicción por el hecho de que la familia Werserian no haya estado a la altura de la confianza y las obligaciones que le fueron depositadas. Confío en que el noble linaje que ocupe su lugar en el futuro demuestre ser más digno que mi propia sangre».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}少しためらうアベラルドの顔には長年の苦難がこの瞬間だけはっきりと表れている。{/n}「ウェルセリアン家がその義務と信頼に{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}応えることができなかった{/d}ことに対して、遺憾の意を表明させてください。今後、どのような高貴な家系が我らの代わりを務めようと、我が血族より素晴らしい働きをすることを願います」
languages.original_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}少しためらうアベラルドの顔には長年の苦難がこの瞬間だけはっきりと表れている。{/n}「ウェルセリアン家がその義務と信頼に応えることができなかったことに対して、遺憾の意を表明させてください。今後、どのような高貴な家系が我らの代わりを務めようと、我が血族より素晴らしい働きをすることを願います」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “嗯，舰长大人……”{n}阿贝拉德犹豫了片刻。这一刻，他的脸上清晰地显露出岁月刻下的痕迹。{/n}“请允许我表示遗憾，韦尔森家族{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}未能履行{/d}它被赋予的义务和信任。将来，无论是哪支贵族血脉取代了我们的位置，我都希望他们能比我的家族做得更好。”
languages.original_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，舰长大人……”{n}阿贝拉德犹豫了片刻。这一刻，他的脸上清晰地显露出岁月刻下的痕迹。{/n}“请允许我表示遗憾，韦尔森家族未能履行它被赋予的义务和信任。将来，无论是哪支贵族血脉取代了我们的位置，我都希望他们能比我的家族做得更好。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Abélard s'interrompt un instant. Dans ce moment d'hésitation, son visage révèle brutalement le poids de ses années.{/n} « À mon plus grand regret, la famille Werserian n'a {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}pas été à la hauteur{/d} de ses obligations et de la confiance placée en elle. J'espère que la noble lignée qui la remplacera à l‘avenir saura se montrer meilleure que la mienne. »
languages.original_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Abélard s'interrompt un instant. Dans ce moment d'hésitation, son visage révèle brutalement le poids de ses années.{/n} « À mon plus grand regret, la famille Werserian n'a pas été à la hauteur de ses obligations et de la confiance placée en elle. J'espère que la noble lignée qui la remplacera à l‘avenir saura se montrer meilleure que la mienne. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, Lord Captain ..." {n}Abelard zögert leicht. Seiner Miene ist in diesem Augenblick die Last all seiner Jahre anzusehen.{/n} "Gestattet mir, meinem Bedauern darüber Ausdruck zu verleihen, dass die Familie Werserian ihren Pflichten und dem in sie gesetzten Vertrauen {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}nicht gerecht werden konnte{/d}. Welches Adelsgeschlecht in Zukunft auch unseren Platz einnehmen mag, ich hoffe, es erweist sich als zuverlässiger denn mein Blut."
languages.original_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Lord Captain ..." {n}Abelard zögert leicht. Seiner Miene ist in diesem Augenblick die Last all seiner Jahre anzusehen.{/n} "Gestattet mir, meinem Bedauern darüber Ausdruck zu verleihen, dass die Familie Werserian ihren Pflichten und dem in sie gesetzten Vertrauen nicht gerecht werden konnte. Welches Adelsgeschlecht in Zukunft auch unseren Platz einnehmen mag, ich hoffe, es erweist sich als zuverlässiger denn mein Blut."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has failed to live up to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Yılların yorgunluğu yüzüne tüm çıplaklığıyla vuran Abelard, bir nebze tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Werserian hanesinin sorumluluklarını {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}yerine getirememesi{/d} ve kendine duyulan güveni boşa çıkarmasından ötürü duyduğum pişmanlığı belirtmek isterim. Halef soylu hanenin kendi nesebimden daha liyakatli olmasını dilerim."
languages.original_text: "Well, Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard hesitates slightly, his face starkly showing the toll of all his years in this moment.{/n} "Allow me to express my regret that the Werserian family has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledFamily}failed to live up{/d} to the obligations and trust placed in it. I hope that whatever noble line takes its place in the future will prove itself better than my blood."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Yılların yorgunluğu yüzüne tüm çıplaklığıyla vuran Abelard, bir nebze tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Werserian hanesinin sorumluluklarını yerine getirememesi ve kendine duyulan güveni boşa çıkarmasından ötürü duyduğum pişmanlığı belirtmek isterim. Yerine gelecek soylu hanenin kendi nesebimden daha liyakatli olmasını dilerim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Yılların yorgunluğu yüzüne tüm çıplaklığıyla vuran Abelard, bir nebze tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Werserian hanesinin sorumluluklarını yerine getirememesi ve kendine duyulan güveni boşa çıkarmasından ötürü duyduğum pişmanlığı belirtmek isterim. Yerine gelecek soylu hanenin kendi nesebimden daha liyakatli olmasını dilerim."
